annotations.description: The "Thanks-tini" is the brainchild of Barney Stinson, and it's not great. Can we make a version that he would describe as legend...wait for it...dary? GET T...
annotations.title: Recreated - "Thanks-tini" from How I Met Your Mother

textContent:
1 oz ruby port
.5 oz maple syrup
.75 oz lemon juice
1 oz gin or bourbon
1 barspoon cranberry sauce or juice

Shake and strain over crushed ice into rocks glass. 
Garnish with sage sprig. 

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=-BjodRCv6n0&t=4s
title: Thanks-tini
